caption.center: IN RE JASON SCOTT METCALFE AND HENRY CASTRO D/B/A AH, Relators.

court.center: Court of Appeals of Texas, Fifth District, Dallas.

opinion.posture:
Original Proceeding from the County Court at Law No. 5, Dallas County, Texas, Trial Court Cause No. 01-02265-E.
Writ of Mandamus Denied.
opinion.panel: Before Justices WRIGHT, O'NEILL, and LANG.
opinion.opinion_text: Relators contend the trial court erred in not ruling on the merits of the motion to set aside default judgment. Relators have failed to verify their petition. See Tex.R.App.P. 52.3. Accordingly, we DENY relators' petition for writ of mandamus.See Tex.R.App.P. 52.8(a).
